## geras.ConstantProvider class

An object that provides constants for rendering blocks in Geras mode.  Blockly.geras.ConstantProvider

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ConstantProvider extends BaseConstantProvider 
```
<b>Extends:</b> BaseConstantProvider

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ConstantProvider` class.
